Attachment
The type Attachment represents a file attached to a request.
AttachmentController
Provides the attachment controller functionality.
AttachmentRepository
The AttachmentRepository extends the CrudRepository for basic CRUD operations on a RDBMS via Hibernate.
AttachmentService
The AttachmentService interface provides access to application functionality and features for file attachments .
AttachmentServiceImpl
The implementation of the Attachment service.
AuthenticationRequestBody
The DTO marshalled from the HTTP request to the authenticate function of the CommonController*.
CommonController
Provides shared utility functions to other controllers.
JwtTokenAuthenticationFilter
 
JWTUtils
A collection of utility functions for dealing with Java Web Tokens (JWT).
NoSecurityConfig
The disabled Security configuration for the Spring Boot application.
ProfileController
Provides the user profile controller functionality.
ProfileRepository
The ProfileRepository extends the CrudRepository for basic CRUD operations on a RDBMS via Hibernate.
ProfileService
The ProfileService interface provides access to application functionality and features for user profiles.
ProfileServiceImpl
The implementation of the User Profile service.
ResponseFile
The type Response file.
ResponseMessage
The ResponseMessage instance is the returned object from a REST API call of a controller class (i.e.
ResponseMessageWithAttachment
An extended ResponseMessage with a Attachment as the payload.
ResponseMessageWithAttachments
An extended ResponseMessage with an array of Attachments as the payload.
ResponseMessageWithUserProfile
An extended ResponseMessage with a User Profile as the payload.
ResponseMessageWithUserProfiles
An extended ResponseMessage with an array of User Profiles as the payload.

The Security configuration for the Spring Boot application.
